text: This place has a nice British old building vibes with modern touch to it, we book the place for my sister wedding and it all went well. The bungalow is big with 2 rooms downstairs and a room upstairs, the Aircon works great, there's BBQ pit with lotsa sittings outside and outdoor dining table and all this with sea view of big ships passing by. The outdoor has total space of like half of the soccer field from the entrance to everything except the house. Yeah it's big private space we're talking here.

It's such a beautiful cottage. I had my wedding here on the 16th of February. Do note that you need to be a member to book this venue and there's a corporate rate for weddings. Which means you'll have to pay for the usage of lawn as well. But it's worth every penny! Will blog about this venue soon.
Nice place get together with family n friends for party BBQ children will love it and nice beach, for relaxing

It's acessable by taxi own car and public transport cottage is English like era serene facing the coastline front pulau tekong cottage near changi point distance walk to changi village and hawker centre first visit to this place as though on vacation out of Singapore üëçüëçüëçü§©
Very well decorated with aircon chalet, which late LKY stayed there before.
